mapper.select:
select t1.id as id ,t3.`name` as subjectName,t4.name as studentName,t4.gender as gender, t4.nation as nation,t4.state as state ,t1.create_time as createTime, t4.birthday as birthday,t5.name as schoolName ,t2.exam_time as examTime,t2.exam_Address as examAddress,t2.* from
t_entry_form as t1 ,t_exam as t2 ,t_subject as t3 ,t_student as t4 ,t_school as t5
where t1.exam_id = t2.id and t1.student_id = t4.id and t3.id = t2.subject_id and t5.id = t2.school_id
AND t1.id =#{examId}
